channel.title: Awesome Curated on ~/.andy_winarko
channel.description: Recent content in Awesome Curated on ~/.andy_winarko

item.title: Awesome Crawler
item.description: Awesome-crawler A collection of awesome web crawler,spider and resources in different languages. Contents Awesome-crawler Contents Python Java C# JavaScript PHP C++ C Ruby R Erlang Perl Go Scala Python Scrapy - A fast high-level screen scraping and web crawling framework. django-dynamic-scraper - Creating Scrapy scrapers via the Django admin interface. Scrapy-Redis - Redis-based components for Scrapy. scrapy-cluster - Uses Redis and Kafka to create a distributed on demand scraping cluster.
